author: Cleo Abram
description:
What would happen if you drilled a hole straight through the ice in Antarctica…and jumped in?

You jump in and the snow around you quickly changes to dense blue ice…

As you go deeper, you realize the air bubbles trapped all around you are from the time of the Renaissance on the surface…
… then Ancient Rome… 
… then the last Ice Age!

But the pressure is rising and you’re getting closer to Earth’s hot core, the ice suddenly turns into…

To find out what it is, subscribe!

#shorts #Antarctica #ice #mystery #science
title: What’s Hidden Under Antarctica?
